We conduct stratified randomize trial 410 HIV-negative pregnant Ugandan woman enrol individually 410 HIV-negative pregnant woman enrol male partner Mulago Hospital , Kampala St Joseph Hospital , Kitgum , Northern Uganda . In site , 205 woman enrol individually 205 couple randomize either retested counsel HIV late pregnancy ( > 36 week ) per WHO/Ministry Health ( MOH ) recommendation , receive ERHTEC throughout pregnancy breastfeeding .
